page.title: 17B.M.X.RACING BY JOHNATHON
page.content: My favourite hobby is B.M.X.ing. What is B.M.X.? Well it stands for Bicycle Motor Cross.In order to do BMXing you need a special bike with re-inforced tubing to make it extra strong to withstand all the bumps. There are two types of BMX competition 1.{FREESTYLE} 2.{RACING} Freestyle is when you have to do different tricks with your bike like hops,framewhips,boomerang,endos and wheelies.These are just a few. Many children,like myself enjoy doing these stunts anywhere we can. Racing is when you have to go on a special track with big bumps and very sharp turns and other obstacles and you compete against other riders. B.M.X. is an ace sport !!!!!
